name: Animal Friends Insurance Ltd
overview:
Animal Friends Insurance is an ethical pet insurance company that donates large amounts from our own profits to animal charities worldwide each year to help less fortunate animals in desperate need of care, attention, shelter and sometimes just love.

Through providing a wide range of comprehensive pet insurance policies we donate and support thousands of animal welfare charities all over the world. To date we have donated over £1.25 million to animal welfare.

Our Mission Statement:

A commitment to providing affordable pet insurance cover with a quality of service that will be remembered and recommended whilst helping to fund animal welfare charities worldwide and raising awareness of their work.

milestones.description: Winner Outstanding Claims Team of the Year
